0.title: [stationName] Autumn Average Precipitation
0.subTitle: September to November
0.caption: Average annual autumn (Septembe to November) precipitation. The lowest (min) and highest (max) precipitation of the month.

1.title: [stationName] Autumn Average Precipitation Difference from Baseline
1.caption: Difference between the autumn (September-November) seasonal averages and the average for the baseline period, typically 1961 to 1990.
